alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 7:21PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong winds will impact portions of northeastern Douglas and western Arapahoe Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 720 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong winds 4 miles south of Arapahoe Park, or 17 miles southeast of Denver, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aurora, southeastern Centennial, northern Parker, and Arapahoe Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
